# showsStateColumn

**Instance Property**

Indicates whether the menu displays the state column.

## Declaration

```swift
var showsStateColumn: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property contains a Boolean value indicating whether the menu displays the state column. The default value for this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].
title: showsStateColumn
